properties.Name: RebateAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: AgreementStartDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Agreement becomes effective.

Columns.Name: AgreementEndDate
Columns.Description: The end date that of the Agreement.

Columns.Name: MinimumPurchaseQuantity
Columns.Description: The minimum quantity that must be purchased for the rebate to be applicable.

Columns.Name: MinimumPurchaseAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum dollar value that must be purchased for the rebate to be applicable.

Columns.Name: RebatePercentage
Columns.Description: The percent of total purchases that are to be rebated should the minimum purchase thresholds be met during the agreement period.

Columns.Name: RebateRecipientIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the company is acting as the potential rebate recipient or payor in the contract.

Properties.Description: An agreement that defines the terms and conditions under which a rebate will be provided. This agreement typically defines the minimum purchase levels over a defined period required to receive the rebate.
